info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 10 at 2:02PM PDT until September 10 at 6:00PM PDT by NWS Sacramento CA
info.description:
FFWSTO
The National Weather Service in Sacramento has issued a
* Flash Flood Warning for... The Tehama County Division of the Park Fire burn scar in... Eastern Tehama County in northern California...
* Until 600 PM PDT.
* At 202 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain training over the Tehama County Division of the Park Fire Burn Scar. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly.
Excessive rainfall over the warning area will cause mud slides near steep terrain. The mud slide can consist of rock, mud, vegetation and other loose materials.
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding in and around the Tehama County Division of the Park Fire Burn Scar.
SOURCE...Radar.
IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of areas in and around the Tehama County Division of the Park Fire Burn Scar.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Mineral, Paynes Creek and Manton.
* Additional locations include... Highway 36 corridor, Paynes Creek, Mill Creek, Deer Creek, and Pine Creek
info.instruction:
This is a life threatening situation. Heavy rainfall will cause extensive and severe flash flooding of creeks...streams...and ditches in the Tehama County Division of the Park Fire Burn Scar. Severe debris flows can also be anticipated across roads. Roads and driveways may be washed away in places. If you encounter flood waters...climb to safety.
Move away from recently burned areas. Life-threatening flooding of creeks, roads and normally dry areas is likely. The heavy rains will likely trigger rockslides, mudslides and debris flows in steep terrain, especially in and around these areas.
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

parameter.value: NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 6:00 PM PDT. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD WARNING is in effect for this area until 6:00 PM PDT. This is a dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 6:00 PM PDT. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 6:00 PM PDT. Esta es una situacion peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.
